COLUMN-THREE.LABEL: About me
COLUMN-THREE.DESCRIPTION: I am an independent, self-taught, committed, goal-focused, creative and team worker person. I love systems, mathematics, tennis and I have the soul of a leader.

PORTFOLIO.PROYECT-I-DESCRIPTION: Creation and use of a basic component library.
PORTFOLIO.PROYECT-II-DESCRIPTION: IONIC mobile app, with your favorite places.
PORTFOLIO.PROYECT-III-DESCRIPTION: Management system for the administration of a gym.
PORTFOLIO.PROYECT-IV-DESCRIPTION: Team management system; of with leader and members.
PORTFOLIO.PROYECT-V-DESCRIPTION: Web app with collection and teams of pokemons.
PORTFOLIO.PROYECT-VI-DESCRIPTION: Are you a human or are you a mutant? Find it out...
PORTFOLIO.PROYECT-VII-DESCRIPTION: Website for the promotion and management of a hotel.
PORTFOLIO.PROYECT-VIII-DESCRIPTION: Web app, where you can upload your license online.
PORTFOLIO.PROYECT-IX-DESCRIPTION: OOP exercise in Java; with relationships.

A-ITEM.TITLE: Adaptive Design
A-ITEM.DESCRIPTION: We guarantee that your website will display flawlessly on any device, including desktop computers, tablets and mobile phones.

B-ITEM.TITLE: Advice & Consultation
B-ITEM.DESCRIPTION: We provide advisory services for colleagues and companies in their digital transformation. We also carry out online programming and mathematics classes.

C-ITEM.TITLE: Creative Design
C-ITEM.DESCRIPTION: The digital face of your business deserves to stand out. With an attractive web design, you will not only leave a great impression, but you will also attract more potential customers.

D-ITEM.TITLE: Hosting & Domain
D-ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Boost your brand with our comprehensive service that includes a domain name and web hosting on the fastest server for one year. This offer strengthens your online presence, guaranteeing optimal performance.

E-ITEM.TITLE: Maintenance
E-ITEM.DESCRIPTION: We take care of all the modifications you want on your site and/or, ensuring smooth operation to attract and retain your potential customers.

F-ITEM.TITLE: SEO
F-ITEM.DESCRIPTION: We optimize your website with a smart SEO strategy, positioning your business at the top of Google results to increase its visibility and attraction.
